short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Word Blitz Hack made by Code Cowboy on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPDATE 18TH MARCH 2024: This app is currently broken, I am working on fixing it!

A extension to help you play the game 'Word Blitz' on Facebook. Simply load the game, then once the letters appear, press the 'Inject Hack' option and watch as it scores every single possible word!

If you have any issues with the extension, please email me at realcodecowboy@gmail.com, and I will fix them for you :)
